content: this pattern is written in english using u s crochet terms skill level easy supplies needed ✨yarn 6 super bulky bernat blanket in white about 1 2 oz ✨hooks l 8mm hook ✨tools & notions scissors yarn needle stitch markers ✨other materials poly-fil stuffing 2 black 12mm safety eyes pink blush copyright © 2022 mama crochetti do not alter duplicate redistribute or sell pattern intended for personal use only feel free to sell your products made using this pattern please credit mama crochetti all photos are copyright and should never be used to sell your products
